traits.Keen Smell: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.Multiattack: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
